text: Isaac Alvarez (26 July 1930 – 3 November 2020) was an Egyptian-born French actor, mime, and choreographer. He founded the École du théâtre du mouvement in Paris in 1956 with Jacques Lecoq. In 1981, he founded the Théâtre du Moulinage in Lussas. Alvarez traveled across France to teach with the Comédiens-mimes de Paris. Alvarez died in Aubenas, France on 3 November 2020 at the age of 90. ==Movies== *La Belle Équipe (1958) *Julie la Rousse (1959) *Du rififi chez les femmes (1959) *Cyrano de Bergerac (1960) *Etudes aux Allures et Les Trois Soldats (1961) *Le Perroquet du fils Hoquet (1963) *Belphegor, or Phantom of the Louvre (1965) *Les Compagnons de Baal (1968) ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French theatre directors Category:French choreographers Category:Mimes Category:People from Alexandria
title: Isaac Alvarez
